title: Karthus ward bug
body:
When Karthus sets a ward, he is heard globally, so far I've heard it as an ally, not sure if the enemies can hear his ward flavor text, will test and come back.

This seems to occur on all skins as far as I and my friends have heard.

replies.body: So nerffing the wall on Karthus has caused bugs hmmm maybe if they reverted the changes it would fix them.

Hey actual salt - 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are investigating! :3
